doc.field: American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
Series II: Constitution, By-Laws, Agreements, Codes, and Contracts
Series II: Constitution, By-Laws, Agreements, Codes, and Contracts

This series is comprised of constitutions and by-laws for both AFRA and AFTRA, as well as national agreements, codes and contracts. These files document the fundamental principles of the organization and the internal rules for how to conduct activities. Included are copies of local television codes for multiple cities, including Chicago, Los Angeles, and San Francisco, as well as national codes governing phonograph recordings and television commercials.
